title: I Make Her Weak In The Knees
itunes:title: I Make Her Weak In The Knees
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a 30 year old man and I’m 6 feet tall and I weigh 202 pounds. I work out and eat right and take care of myself. In February, I met a beautiful woman that is a few months younger than I am. She is 5’6” and she weighs 330 pounds. I like what I like, and that happens to be big girls. She is big and soft in the right places and she’s always fly and sexy.................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
